room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by America's Escape Game Tampa in Tampa
room_address: 10033 N Dale Mabry Hwy Carrollwood, FL 33618
room_description: A suspicious fire engulfed the Oakridge Lunatic Asylum. 5 patients under the care of Dr. Rutger were presumed killed, but their bodies were never recovered. Dr. Rutger’s late wife Helen made a death-bed confession – her husband had a special room where he performed his darkest and unspeakable works… Navigate the madness in the remains of the Oakridge Lunatic Asylum and solve the case – if you can. Your group’s mission will be to enter the remains of the asylum and unlock the secrets of Dr. Rutger’s horrifying deeds
